title: What is wanderlust?
subtitle: Discover wanderlust with us!
text: Wanderlust is the desire of getting lost discovering new places and experiences, mainly by means of travelling. In this site, we want to focus in different ways of having this feeling. You have find out what kind of experiences inspire you to have this desire of discovering. Here we want to share what inspire us... Cooking, making DIY projects and small presents, travelling, ...
